product_name: The North Face Waterproof Lumbar Pack - Medium - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfectly paired with a stand up paddleboard or canoe, The North Face Medium Waterproof Lumbar pack keeps your gear safe from splashes and frees up your hands to paddle. Waterproof lumbar pack with roll-top closure ensures your essentials stay dry. The North Face Medium Waterproof Lumbar pack features two hipbelt pockets to store accessories. Closeout.
short_description: Perfectly paired with a stand up paddleboard or canoe, The North Face Medium Waterproof Lumbar pack keeps your gear safe from splashes and frees up your hands to paddle.
